missionDescription: Create a single CLI entrypoint (e.g., src/run.py) that (1) sets all RNG seeds, (2) runs the canonical pipeline, (3) writes ./outputs/results.json and ./outputs/figure.png with a fixed schema, and (4) writes ./outputs/hashes.json containing SHA256 of each artifact for determinism verification.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

projectName: single CLI entrypoint (e.g., src/run.py) that (1) sets all RNG seeds, (2) runs the canonical pipeline, (3) writes ./outputs/results.json and ./outputs/figure.png with a fixed schema, and (4) writes ./outputs/hashes.json containing SHA256 of each artifact for determinism verification.
